name: .MODFEM File Extension
summary: Learn about .MODFEM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 3D model file saved in the FEMAP format; used by Femap, a CAD engineering analysis program; stores geometry, materials, mesh, element properties, loads, and other model data.

content: Femap stands for Finite Element Modeling and Postprocessing, and enables you to build finite element models of engineering problems and view the solution results.
NOTE: The MODFEM file extension replaced the .MOD extension with the release of version 9 of Femap.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
